snippet: Strong figures on private companies’ payrolls and service sector activity were encouraging ahead of Friday’s government jobs survey.
abstract: Batch of good news on economy helps push stock market to new highs.
lead_paragraph: Strong figures on private companies’ payrolls and service sector activity were encouraging ahead of Friday’s government jobs survey.

headline.main: Economic Data Lifts Market to New Highs
headline.print_headline: Economic Data Lifts Market to New Highs
